extendedInfo.description: The Best of Best 3D Archery Game ever!Archery Contest in the gorgeous forest.Play against with your friends.** Updated 2.2 Version **- Added Guest Login.- Added Retry chance on challenge mode- Modified Classic mode item- Modified Challenge mode balance- Modified Center score- Fixed all login problem.Â **FEATURE**- Gorgeous and Beautiful Visuals!- Customizing your character with lots of Items!- Very Easy Control system and Game Play!- Variety game play with COMBO-SYSTEM!- Different Two Game modes(Holding Target, Moving Target)- Ranking System- A Wide Variety of shop stuff* We provide ITEM BACKUP-SYSTEM. Don't worry if you change your phone.* 'Facebook Friends Ranking' is initializing once a week.* When your phone run many application, If you purchase In-App item, Archery star can EXIT often. In this situation, just purchase again. reviews.title: Dosen\'t work.
reviews.comment: This shity game when i started it ot loaded for an hour and kept loading for 3 days!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: I haven\'t even gotten a chance to try it because it will not load. I\'ve re-installed twice. It looks fun please fix so I can play!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more modes
reviews.comment: Best archery mechanic out there but the gameplay modes are not all that, and there are only two.... where are the tournaments, shoot offs, multiple moving targets modes... there is just much more to gain from all this...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: noob Coder of game
reviews.comment: this F**Ker game keeps on loading and do nothing else, this is a TROJAN VIRUS, dont install this game, it will hack all your important phone information and you will be PWNED

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this game but it keeps acting like it wants to freeze and messes up my aiming and makes ne miss shots please fix then i will rate it 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks great...but
reviews.comment: It\'s still loading at the menu screen.  After 15 minutes!!! So...uninstall
reviews.author: Larry DaLeader

reviews.comment: Crap, crap, crap, crap, and crap. Wouldn\'t load and I really wanted to play because either looks really awesome. You need to fix this problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game. Xperia Arc S, Gingerbread 2.3.4
reviews.comment: ... Works fine, sometimes wait few minutes to load, sometimes need to restart game to load. Very hard to make virtual money and change stuffs... Must buy with real money instead... Ridiculous.   Anyway, if you just like to shoot same arrows on the same static background, with same character, no other changes in the game... This is for ya. Need more options, characters, etc, and make it easy to buy from shop with no real money.
